name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - Higher Cost Insulin Pen Needles
title: Cost per 1000 registered patients
description: Cost of higher cost (≥£5/box) insulin pen needles per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Insulin pen needles range in price between approximately £3.95 to £30.00 per box. There is no evidence that suggests
that there are any significant differences between brands of needles, although there are reommendations about length of needle.
NHS England is promoting the use of lower cost needles, i.e. those under £5 per box, which are already in widespread use across the NHS.
numerator_from: {hscic}.normalised_prescribing p LEFT JOIN {measures}.vw__median_price_per_unit r ON p.month=r.date AND p.bnf_code=r.bnf_code
numerator_where: (SELECT bnf_code FROM dmd.vmp WHERE nm  LIKE '%insulin needles%' AND bnf_code IS NOT NULL
SELECT amp.bnf_code FROM dmd.amp AS amp INNER JOIN dmd.vmp ON vmp.id = amp.vmp  WHERE vmp.nm LIKE '%insulin needles%' AND amp.bnf_code IS NOT NULL)
AND UPPER(p.bnf_name) LIKE '%NEEDLES%' --Codes contain other products as well, so this selects needles only
AND r.median_price_per_unit >= 0.05 --this selects products with median price of >= 5 pound a box
numerator_bnf_codes_query: ON p.month = r.date AND p.bnf_code = r.bnf_code
